name: 1968: Málaga Gazpacho
recipeCategory: easy, lunch, quick, soups and stews
keywords: appetizer, bell pepper, cucumber, tomato, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 cups cored, coarsely chopped fresh tomato
1 green pepper, cored, seeded and coarsely chopped
2 slices untrimmed fresh white bread, cubed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in the container of an electric blender. Blend at high speed, pausing now and then to scrape down with a rubber spatula as necessary.

Pour the mixture through a large sieve placed inside a mixing bowl. Press and stir with a wooden spoon to extract as much liquid as possible. Discard the solids. Taste soup for seasoning and add more salt and vinegar if desired. Chill thoroughly before serving.
